income_messages:
From: m****************9@aol.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-21 01:18:15
SUBJECT: ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Mu
ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Muhammad Buhari GCFR, The outgoing
president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. During my executive
meeting with director Central bank, the Minister of Foreign affairs
and EFCC chairman, I was told that the sum of US$1 billion dollars
budgeted to pay all the defrauded victims that your name included was
still in the Debts settlement management account and they refused to
distribute said funds to the rightful beneficiaries due to greedy and
selfishness. I have tackled this very issue on my speech last week at
Presidential forthcoming election campaign where I categorically
stated that every beneficiary shall receive his/her fund before I
handover power to new administration on May 28, 2023
However, I order the banking sector to make these funds available for
remittance or delivery to beneficiaries and through some collective
idea I would sincerely apologize for what you have been through and to
those using my name, images and various fake documents to extort
people’s money shall brought to the book for prosecution and possibly
go to jail for making this country (Nigeria) into disrepute before the
United Nations. As the power vested in me as Incumbent president I
assure you that your fund will be released to you by all legal tenders
to carry out your transaction respectively. It's the proper time to
rebuild the trust you have in this country and all your lost hope will
be restored back as you are now privileged to communicate directly
with me.
Sincerely
Muhammadu Buhari GCFR
President Federal Republic of Nigeria
From: m****************9@aol.com
To: jr22458@m**************p
Time: 2023-02-21 21:19:29
SUBJECT: Re: ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Mu
I appreciate your productive response regardless of your decisive decision you have made before this email came to you, I understand your aggressive expression or thoughts because of the negative encounter you have with some individuals in this country who call and message you every day to extort whatever little thing that you earn for living. As a matter of fact, I have instructed the EFCC to fish out these fraudsters while I personally monitor these protocols to ensure you get your US$10,500,000 (Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars), I have entered into a valid agreement with your embassy here and the International Monetary Fund to complete this transaction and they said that the only amount it will cost to complete your transfer or delivery fund is sum of US$100.00 to distribute this transaction legally as I have already explained in the first letter.
The following option is a solid method to process and secure your payment without stopping half-way, but then you need to choose the desired way that you are likely to receive your fund before taking your request to a designated sector to execute your remittance or delivery fund with urgent effect.
Here are the options to receive your fund;1. Bank wire transfer2. Western union transfer3. Online banking transfer4. ATM card delivery5. Cashier check6. Consignment Box delivery7. Bitcoin payment.
Meanwhile, you requested to choose any of the following options such as Western Union / Bitcoin / Cash App or Gifts card to pay the fee US$100.00 to enable you to have access to your funds immediately, i am looking forward to your urgent response to choose the way you wish to make the payment. Thanks!
Finally, make sure that you reconfirm your full details.1) FULL NAMES:2) DELIVERY ADDRESS:3) PHONE NUMBER4) COUNTRY:
Sincerely,Muhammadu BuhariPresident Federal Republic of Nigeria
outbound_messages:
From: jr22458@m**************p
To: m****************9@aol.com
Time: 2023-02-21 01:18:16
SUBJECT: Re: ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Mu
That sounds like a great chance for both of us. I would like to talk further about your plans.
Best,
Nicole
From: jr22458@m**************p
To: m****************9@aol.com
Time: 2023-02-21 22:17:12
SUBJECT: Re: ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Mu
That sounds like a opportunity. How long it takes to get my benefits?
Best,
Nicole

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Mu
conversations.body:
ATTENDTION, Behold, This is Muhammad Buhari GCFR, The outgoing
president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. During my executive
meeting with director Central bank, the Minister of Foreign affairs
and EFCC chairman, I was told that the sum of US$1 billion dollars
budgeted to pay all the defrauded victims that your name included was
still in the Debts settlement management account and they refused to
distribute said funds to the rightful beneficiaries due to greedy and
selfishness. I have tackled this very issue on my speech last week at
Presidential forthcoming election campaign where I categorically
stated that every beneficiary shall receive his/her fund before I
handover power to new administration on May 28, 2023
However, I order the banking sector to make these funds available for
remittance or delivery to beneficiaries and through some collective
idea I would sincerely apologize for what you have been through and to
those using my name, images and various fake documents to extort
people’s money shall brought to the book for prosecution and possibly
go to jail for making this country (Nigeria) into disrepute before the
United Nations. As the power vested in me as Incumbent president I
assure you that your fund will be released to you by all legal tenders
to carry out your transaction respectively. It's the proper time to
rebuild the trust you have in this country and all your lost hope will
be restored back as you are now privileged to communicate directly
with me.
Sincerely
Muhammadu Buhari GCFR
President Federal Republic of Nigeria
